scripts.app:sync: rm -rf my-app/resources/* && cp -r dist/* my-app/resources/ && cp my-app/resources/index.html my-app/resources/temp.html && sed 's|</body>|<script src="js/neutralino.js"></script></body>|' my-app/resources/temp.html > my-app/resources/index.html && rm my-app/resources/temp.html
scripts.app:run: npm run build && npm run app:sync && cd my-app && neu run
scripts.app:build: npm run build && npm run app:sync && cd my-app && neu build
